sourceMeaningMnemonic: There's an <radical>icicle</radical> on a <radical>dog</radical>. That is the dog's <kanji>condition</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine a couple police officers looking at the dog, talking specifically about the condition they found the dog in.
readingMnemonic: The frozen <kanji>condition</kanji> of this dog was caused by <reading>Jou</reading>rm (<ja>じょう</ja>), the local farmhand. He forgot to let the dog back inside, and then it froze.
readingInfo: But, did Jourm forget? We all know he's a bit clumsy and slow, but he's been letting the dog inside for years now. Would he really do this by accident? That's what the police seem to think, despite the condition they found the dog in.
